title: Become a Member
description: To advance from an Sidekick to a Member, you will need to be Championed by an existing Save Dao Member. Once you find a Champion, you can stake "Super" $SAVEx Tokens with he/she.  These wrapped erc20 (Ethereum) tokens are integral to our platform.  We call these "super", based on the recent implementation of the superfluid protocol. See the Champion a New Member for how this works.
